show_name: Hans Christian Andersen's The Little Mermaid (movie)
other_title: Andersen's Children's Story: The Mermaid Princess
La Sirenetta: La più bella favola di Andersen (Italian)
アンデルセン童話 にんぎょ姫 (Japanese)
plot: Marina, the most beautiful mermaid in the royal Merman family, is curious about the human world. One day, she sees a handsome prince on a boat. Suddenly, a storm comes up, throwing him into the sea. Marina saves her handsome prince and swims him to the shore. Marina falls deeply in love and desperatly wants to become a human. Despite the hazards, ahe is willing to risk it all for love.
